name: Sonder (itch)
description:
Find your friends. Share their strength

A game of moving forward together. Every person resisting has their own story of how they came to be here in this moment. By sharing our stories, we all become stronger. You are not alone.

Sonder
n. the realization that each random passerby is living a life as vivid and complex as your own—populated with their own ambitions, friends, routines, worries and inherited craziness—an epic story that continues invisibly around you like an anthill sprawling deep underground, with elaborate passageways to thousands of other lives that you'll never know existed, in which you might appear only once, as an extra sipping coffee in the background, as a blur of traffic passing on the highway, as a lighted window at dusk.
- From the Dictionary of Obscure Sorrows
